about_the_game:
Animals Gallery

This Animals-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! The cute, the wild and the amazing!

See what nature has to offer in this gallery!

Contents

The Animals gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Poobie the Parrot
  • Fox
  • Nest
  • Hermit Crabs
  • Hedgehog
  • Rabbit
  • Wolf
  • Fishing Bear
  • Meme Cat
  • Red Panda
  • Puffins
  • Octopus
  • Meadow
  • Kennel
  • Australian
  • Penguin
  • Savannah
  • Otters
  • Marcel the Cat
  • Coral Reef
  • Hammerhead Shark

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Animals Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This Animals-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! The cute, the wild and the amazing! See what nature has to offer in this gallery!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
